item.description:
I got this idea from the Friends of the Myles Standish group. I couldn't make their hike on Friday night so I figured we could have our own. And we've had enough social gatherings it's time we added some physical activity.

I'm just going to do the Reservoir hike because it will be dark and I know that trail best.

Please dress for the cold. It's supposed to be in the 20's. But the sky is supposed to be very clear with just a few clouds.

Bring a flashlight. Nothing too bright.

The Apres-hike festivities will be at the Little Red Smokehouse if anyone cares to join us there.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Ranger Station Parking Lot - I'm sure we'll be the only nuts there.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Almost Full Moon Hike
